##**Multiple Cursors**

Using RStudio as our IDE, we can edit multiple places at the same time with "multiple cursors". 
We can create multiple cursors by: 

1. Ctrl+Alt and use the keyboard up/down arrows

![](D:/Amir/Dropbox/MySite/AmirDJV.github.io/content/post/R_and_RStudio_tricks_and_shortcuts/Ctrl_Alt.gif)

##**RStudio Addin Snippets**

As the description in their github page says: "RStudio add-in to copy data to clipboard, reverse slashes, insert and reformat pipes". 
For now I mainly found this addin useful for its "reverse slashes" method. 

After installig the addin in your RStudio using the following commend: 
```{r, eval = FALSE}
devtools::install_github("sfr/RStudio-Addin-Snippets")
```

A new menu chunk in your "Addins" menu will be added. Next, we can copy and paste using the menu (Addins -> convert slash).
